title: Are there going to be free transfers at the end of this year ?
body: I want to know if there are going to be any free transfers this year EUW-EUNE - EUNE-EUW its been a long time since there was a free transfer for these regions and i want to go back to EUNE :/

replies.body: I've really only seen free transfers occur for circumstantial events like new regions, so it's not really a regular thing.  I don't have any information on such on occasion happening and I wouldn't expect it, but you can always bookmark the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page just in case.  Hope that helps clear some things up!
